SELECT cu.id, cc.coupon_code, cu.coupon_user_code, cc.coupon_name, u.username, cu.attribute, cu.channel, CASE cc.coupon_type WHEN 1 THEN '体验金' WHEN 2 THEN '加息券' WHEN 3 THEN '代金券' END AS coupon_type, CASE cc.coupon_type WHEN 1 THEN CONCAT( FORMAT(cc.coupon_quota, 2), '元' ) WHEN 2 THEN CONCAT(cc.coupon_quota, '%') WHEN 3 THEN CONCAT( FORMAT(cc.coupon_quota, 2), '元' ) ELSE CONCAT(cc.coupon_quota, '%') END AS coupon_quota, CASE WHEN cu.coupon_source = 1 THEN '手动发放' WHEN cu.coupon_source = 2 THEN '活动发放' WHEN cu.coupon_source = 3 THEN '会员礼包' ELSE '' END AS coupon_source,
CASE WHEN cu.coupon_source = 1 THEN cu.content ELSE IFNULL(cu.content, '') END AS coupon_content, FROM_UNIXTIME( cu.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS end_time, cu.used_flag, CASE WHEN cu.used_flag = 0 THEN '未使用' WHEN cu.used_flag = 1 THEN '已使用' WHEN cu.used_flag = 2 THEN '审核不通过' WHEN cu.used_flag = 3 THEN '待审核' WHEN cu.used_flag = 4 THEN '已失效' END used_flag_View, FROM_UNIXTIME( cu.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' ) AS add_time, cc.coupon_system AS coupon_system, cc.project_type AS project_type, CASE WHEN cc.tender_quota_type = 0 THEN '出借金额不限' WHEN cc.tender_quota_type = 1 THEN CONCAT( cc.tender_quota_min, '元~', cc.tender_quota_max, '元可用' ) WHEN cc.tender_quota_type = 2 THEN CONCAT( '满', cc.tender_quota, '元可用' ) WHEN cc.tender_quota_type = 3 THEN CONCAT( cc.tender_quota, '元（含）内可用' ) ELSE '出借金额不限' END tender_quota, CASE WHEN cc.project_expiration_type = 0 THEN '项目期限不限' WHEN cc.project_expiration_type = 1 THEN CONCAT( '等于', cc.project_expiration_length, '月' ) WHEN cc.project_expiration_type = 2 THEN CONCAT( cc.project_expiration_length_min, '月~', cc.project_expiration_length_max, '月' ) WHEN cc.project_expiration_type = 3 THEN CONCAT( '大于等于', cc.project_expiration_length, '月' ) WHEN cc.project_expiration_type = 4 THEN CONCAT( '小于等于', cc.project_expiration_length, '月' ) ELSE '项目期限不限' END project_expiration_type, cu.activity_id FROM ht_coupon_user cu LEFT JOIN ht_r_user u ON cu.user_id = u.user_id JOIN ht_coupon_config cc ON cu.coupon_code = cc.coupon_code AND cc.del_flag = 0
ORDER BY cu.id DESC
LIMIT #{limitStart} , #{limitEnd}
SELECT count(cu.id) FROM ht_coupon_user cu JOIN (SELECT coupon_code FROM ht_coupon_config where del_flag = 0) cc ON cu.coupon_code = cc.coupon_code
SELECT count(1) FROM ht_coupon_user cu JOIN ht_coupon_config cc ON cu.coupon_code = cc.coupon_code LEFT JOIN ht_r_user u ON cu.user_id = u.user_id
SELECT count(1) FROM ht_coupon_user cu WHERE cu.user_id = #{userId} AND cu.used_flag = 0 AND cu.del_flag = 0

SELECT id, coupon_code, user_id, activity_id, used_flag, end_time, content, audit_content, delete_content, audit_user, audit_time, create_time, create_user_id, update_time, update_user_id, del_flag FROM ht_coupon_user cu WHERE cu.user_id = #{userId} AND cu.used_flag = 0 AND cu.del_flag = 0 ORDER BY cu.create_time desc

SELECT id, coupon_code, user_id, activity_id, used_flag, end_time, content, audit_content, delete_content, audit_user, audit_time, create_time, create_user_id, update_time, update_user_id, del_flag FROM ht_coupon_user cu WHERE cu.user_id = #{userId} AND cu.used_flag = 0 AND (cu.read_flag = 0 OR cu.read_flag IS NULL) AND cu.del_flag = 0 ORDER BY cu.create_time desc
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ht_coupon_config c LEFT JOIN ht_coupon_user u ON c.coupon_code = u.coupon_code WHERE c.id = #{couponId} AND u.del_flag=0

SELECT cc.coupon_code, cc.coupon_type, cc.coupon_system, cc.coupon_quota, cc.project_expiration_type, cc.project_expiration_length, cc.project_expiration_length_min, cc.project_expiration_length_max, cc.project_type, cc.tender_quota_type, cc.tender_quota, cc.tender_quota_min, cc.tender_quota_max, cu.coupon_user_code, cu.end_time, cu.used_flag, cu.update_time, cc.add_flag add_flag, cc.coupon_profit_time coupon_profit_time, cc.repay_time_config repayTimeConfig, cc.coupon_profit_time couponProfitTime FROM ht_coupon_user cu INNER JOIN ht_coupon_config cc ON cu.coupon_code = cc.coupon_code WHERE cu.id = #{couponGrantId} AND cu.user_id=#{userId} AND cu.del_flag = 0 AND cc.del_flag = 0

SELECT cc.coupon_code, cc.coupon_type, cc.coupon_system, cc.coupon_quota, cc.project_expiration_type, cc.project_expiration_length, cc.project_expiration_length_min, cc.project_expiration_length_max, cc.project_type, cc.tender_quota_type, cc.tender_quota, cc.tender_quota_min, cc.tender_quota_max, cu.coupon_user_code, cu.end_time, cu.used_flag, cu.update_time, cc.add_flag add_flag, cc.coupon_profit_time coupon_profit_time, cc.repay_time_config repayTimeConfig, cc.coupon_profit_time couponProfitTime FROM ht_borrow_tender_cpn cpn INNER JOIN ht_coupon_tender hct ON cpn.nid = hct.order_id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_user cu ON hct.coupon_grant_id = cu.id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_config cc ON cu.coupon_code = cc.coupon_code WHERE cpn.nid = #{nid} AND cu.del_flag = 0 AND cc.del_flag = 0

SELECT sum( CASE WHEN u.used_flag = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS used_num, sum( CASE WHEN u.used_flag = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS expire_num, COUNT(u.id) grant_num, FORMAT( SUM( IFNULL(cr.recover_account, 0) ), 2 ) recover_interest, FORMAT( sum( IFNULL(cr.recover_account_yes, 0) ), 2 ) AS recived_money, FORMAT( sum( IFNULL(cr.recover_account, 0) ) - sum( IFNULL(cr.recover_account_yes, 0) ), 2 ) AS norecived_money, FORMAT( sum(IFNULL(bts.account, 0)), 3 ) real_tender_money FROM ht_coupon_user u LEFT JOIN ht_coupon_config c ON u.coupon_code = c.coupon_code LEFT JOIN ht_coupon_tender ct ON u.id = ct.coupon_grant_id LEFT JOIN ht_coupon_recover cr ON ct.order_id = cr.tender_id AND cr.recover_period=1 LEFT JOIN ht_coupon_real_tender rts ON ct.order_id = rts.coupon_tender_id LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_tender bts ON rts.real_tender_id = bts.nid WHERE c.coupon_type = 2 AND u.del_flag = 0 GROUP BY u.coupon_source,u.activity_id
LIMIT #{limitStart} , #{limitEnd}

SELECT sum( CASE WHEN u.used_flag = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS used_num, sum( CASE WHEN u.used_flag = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS expire_num, COUNT(u.id) grant_num, FORMAT( SUM( IFNULL(cr.recover_account, 0) ), 2 ) recover_interest, FORMAT( sum( IFNULL(cr.recover_account_yes, 0) ), 2 ) AS recived_money, FORMAT( sum( IFNULL(cr.recover_account, 0) ) - sum( IFNULL(cr.recover_account_yes, 0) ), 2 ) AS norecived_money, FORMAT( sum(IFNULL(bts.account, 0)), 3 ) real_tender_money FROM ht_coupon_user u LEFT JOIN ht_coupon_config c ON u.coupon_code = c.coupon_code LEFT JOIN ht_coupon_tender ct ON u.id = ct.coupon_grant_id LEFT JOIN ht_coupon_recover cr ON ct.order_id = cr.tender_id AND cr.recover_period=1 LEFT JOIN ht_coupon_real_tender rts ON ct.order_id = rts.coupon_tender_id LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_tender bts ON rts.real_tender_id = bts.nid WHERE c.coupon_type = 3 AND u.del_flag = 0 GROUP BY u.coupon_source,u.activity_id
LIMIT #{limitStart} , #{limitEnd}
